Name: Ripassa Valpolicella Ripasso Superiore
Wine Description: Deep ruby red colour and an intense, elegant and persistent bouquet. The palate is harmonious and velvety, with a good structure.

Name: Marañones Garnacha
Wine Description: Cherry colour with claret hues. On the nose, it is varietal and expressive, with aromas of red and ripe fruit and wild herbs. On the palate, it is tasty, fruity and persistent, with a fruity aftertaste.

Name: Saint-Esprit Côtes-du-Rhône
Wine Description: The dress, deep with purple tints. The nose of Syrah varietal aromas predominantly red fruits, violet, licorice palate, its roundness, its scope and finesse make it a unique product in its class.

Name: Garnacha - Syrah
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Reserve Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: The Walking Fool Red Blend
Wine Description: N/A

Name: California Pinot Noir
Wine Description: It has superior texture and mouth-feel and is balanced with bright acidity. Bright garnet in color with aromas of cola, blackberries, cherries and vanilla notes, has a rich layered mouth-feel, abundant in flavor and texture. The many layers find focus on the palette while the supple tannins carry the wine through a soft, balanced and lingering finish.

Name: Ginger's Cuvée Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Aromas of plum and licorice with a hint of tobacco leads to a rich, juicy mouth feel with a long, lingering finish. Flavors of dry cherries and currants layer around this medium body Cabernet Sauvignon.

Name: Rosso (Cariddi)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Brunello di Montalcino
Wine Description: Intense ruby red with purple highlights. Very rich and complex, with aromas of small red fruits, and enriched spicy toasted tones. Powerful and elegant, with a long aromatic finish.

Name: Canon-Fronsac
Wine Description: Very opulent aromas, exhaling well-ripened black cherry and red berry notes. Discrete smoked fragrances mix with mineral features. Supple and vibrant attack, boasting once again an entire range of fruit, including cherry jam and black currant. Toasted avors combine with hints of int stone. Following several years ageing, this wine will develop aromas of tru e – one of the characteristics of its terroir. It expresses plenty of aromatic concentration, underscored by mineral salinity – re ned with plenty of distinction.

Name: Petite Sirah
Wine Description: Expressive notes of cocoa powder, raspberry and lavender introduce this luscious and intensely fruity Petite Syrah. The palate follows with ripe black plum, black coffee, bittersweet chocolate and brown spice wrapped around structured tannins with juicy, berry flavours on the finish.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Rich with bold, concentrated flavors. Notes of dark fruits and blackberries complement robust and velvety tannins.

Name: Freakshow Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: This Cab is deep garnet in color with aromas of cranberry, dark chocolate, vanilla and exotic spice. Medium in body, and boasts bold flavors of raspberry, cocoa nib and pepper that stand out from the oak and spice-laden finish.

Name: The Griffin
Wine Description: Offers aromas of red and black berry fruit, rose petals and just a touch of vanilla. The full body is framed by gently gripping fine tannins and a flood of berry fruit.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Beautiful ruby red colour. The nose opens with intense notes of fresh red fruit, such as cherries and strawberries, lightly underscored with aromas of thyme, bay and mint. Superb volume on the palate, with soft yet well-defined tannins. A wine with a fine balance of fruit.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Ghiaie Della Furba
Wine Description: Deeply intense ruby red practically impenetrable. Ample, complex, elegant, fine, sweet, fruity, intensely spicy.

Name: Tinto Historico
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon Premium Reserve
Wine Description: It is abold, distinguished wine in a dark red hue premium cabernet’s enticing bouquet of blackberry and black pepper unfolds across the palate, lingering with a moderate tannin pull and a hint of spice, which pairs beautifully with red meats and flavorful sauces.

Name: La Sagesse
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Aromas of bright cherry, currant and raspberry with notes of toasted oak and vanilla. In the glass, you will find flavors of cherry and currant and a lingering and thoughtful finish. Good structure, a moderate weight, polished tannins and balanced acidity.

Name: Poderuccio
Wine Description: It has intense fruity bouquet, the result of a fortuitous blending a fruity bouquet and delicate persistence on the palate but a sophisticated product, born in sandy clay soil rich in limestone.

Name: Malbec Blend
Wine Description: The colour is deeply, richly ruby with distinctive purple highlights. Dark fruit aromas dominate, led by red cherries and a hint of cassis alongside oak spice. Tannins are silky, round, and set off flavours that are noticeably fruity, pleasant and easy to drink. Touches of vanilla and spice from the light use of oak add complexity.

Name: Limited Edition Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Appellation Lunlunta Malbec
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Rouge
Wine Description: Pretty red color, with purple reflections.A wine that gives pleasure: authentic, sincere and tasty. It has notes of red and black fruit , rich and spicy. The mouth is fruity and full-bodied boosting the taste buds. Balanced, crisp, with silky tannins, the final has a beautiful aromatic persistence.

Name: Lagrein
Wine Description: Cherry red colour with a ruby shimmer. Intense nose with aromas of fruits (plums, berry) and spicy, animal notes. It is a medium-bodied, structured and fresh wine. Best to drink within 2-6 years.

Name: Rosso di Montalcino
Wine Description: It has intense, ruby red with garnet reflections, the Rosso di Montalcino has a finely intense nose with fragrant aromas of small, fresh fruits. On the palate it is delicately dry with aromatic, long-lasting flavors.

Name: Tarima Monastrell
Wine Description: Red raspberries, cooked cherries, and mulberries show in this wine's expressive nose and mouth; the middle and finish also offer black plums and black raisins. Spices, herbs, and chocolate mark the finish as well.

Name: Kadette Cape Blend
Wine Description: A full bodied wine with ripe, sweet banana and berry flavours. This wine shows remarkable complexity with soft grape tannins and a long dry finish. Classic in style.

Name: Chianti Classico
Wine Description: This wine has a deep sense of elegance and finesse. The quality of fruit is tonic and bright. A well proportioned, elegant body. Dark berry, fresh spice flavors, intense, smooth taste.

Name: Dos Fincas Cabernet Sauvignon - Malbec
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Chianti Colli Fiorentini
Wine Description: Medium intensity ruby red. Fruity, intense, black cherry, violet. Soft, medium bodied, moderate acidity, quite tannic.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: A deep, saturated color leads to lifted aromas of blackberry, cocoa and herby black-currant, which is followed by a rich, layered mouthfeel, loaded with juicy black cherry, cedar, and crème de cassis. This wine is also elegantly structured with fresh acidity and ripe, mature tannins.

Name: Pieve Santa Restituta Brunello di Montalcino
Wine Description: Intense colour, expressive nose, with cherry notes, forest fruits, aromatic herbs and juniper aromas. In the palate expresses ripe tannins,integrated acidity, rich structure and a lingering finish.

Name: Las Alturas Vineyard Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Dense, concentrated ruby color, hinting at the dark berry fruits and rich, textural components in this wine. On the nose, aromas of raspberry, wild blackberry and a slight earthiness. The palate is supple and layered with exotic spices, a rich meatiness, ripe plum, currant and black cherry flavors. The ripe tannins are nicely balanced with acidity, and the finish is long and fulfilling.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Cabernet Sauvignon is aromatically beautiful, introducing itself with alluring notes of dark, red fruit and a peppery spice. The aromatics and oak are seamlessly integrated together in this juicy wine, showcasing the ideal amount of blueberry and blackberry flavors.

Name: Cabernet Franc
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Rouge Intense
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Johnny Q Shiraz
Wine Description: Red with purple hues. Intense fresh ripe berry fruit flavours with integrated vanilla oak. Full bodied dense ripe berry fruit flavours balanced with vanilla oak, long and smooth.

Name: Bordeaux Rouge
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Riserva Ducale Chianti Classico
Wine Description: The wine is intense ruby red. The bouquet is extremely elegant, characterised by flowery and fruity notes. Violet, cherries, wild berries and plums meet with delicately spicy hints of tobacco and white pepper grains. Delicate scents of red roses and flint in the final. Intense, velvety and crispy. Sensations of fragrant fresh fruit are accompanied by steady yet gentle tannins, that exalt enjoyable spicy hints. The whole tasting sensation is enriched by a persistent finish, that is incredibly fresh and pleasantly mineral and presents an aftertaste with fascinating notes of rosemary.

Name: Pavillon du Glana Saint-Julien
Wine Description: It has fresh, fruity and fleshy. It has a beautiful harmony. It has aromas of violets and spice. Try it with poultry, game, meat, and why not, with a small cockerel with tarragon.

Name: Camins del Priorat
Wine Description: Offers full-bodied with rich, deeply concentrated black fruit flavors. Dark spices on the finish with some anise. Great for hearty meat dishes.

Name: Valpolicella Classico
Wine Description: Red ruby color with hints of violets. Very intense fruits of the forest, cherries and raspberries. Good volume, modulated but soft and elegant tannins. Hints of spices integrated with a light taste of mature fruits; in the end, tastes a good sapidity.

Name: Chianti 1877
Wine Description: This medium-bodied, well-balanced wine is approachable and aromatic, with classic Chianti aromas of violet and wonderful cherry fruit flavors. It finishes with spicy hints of wild cherry and hazelnut. It retains these fresh and fruity flavors since it receives no wood aging.

Name: Signature Malbec
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Bourgogne Rouge (Pinot Noir)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Reserva Vendimia Seleccionada
Wine Description: It has a dark, dense colour. Intense, complex bouquet that confirms its ageing in quality oak: powerful aromas of blackberries and blackcurrants with a depth of toasted notes that blend with very fine oak. Pleasantly full on tasting with concentrated flavours. Clearly a wine of character and structure but with a nice, fleshy texture. Classy and elegant with good potential for ageing.

Name: Vieilles Vignes Morgon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Évora Colheita Tinto
Wine Description: Cartuxa wines reflect the tradition and famed quality of the first people to make wine at Cartuxa; Carthusian monks who in 1587 established the Santa Maria Scala Coeli Monastery. It was first produced in 1986. Cartuxa red is a blend of Aragonez, Alicante Bouschet and Trincadeira, planted in the Eugénio de Almeida Foundation vineyards. When the grapes are judged to be perfectly matured, they are carefully picked and brought into the winery for de-stalking, gentle crushing and fermentation in temperature controlled steel vats. There follows an extended maceration period followed by maturation in vats and barrels for 12 months. The wine is aged in bottle for 6 months prior to release.

Name: Cuvée Eden Bordeaux Supérieur
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Double Black Red Blend (Limited Edition)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Paso Robles Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: This is a classic, rich Cabernet Sauvignon with a dark purple color and expressive aromas of black cherry and spice. On the palate the wine is intense, luscious and fullbodied with a rich core of berry and earthy flavors, and there are hints of spice and vanilla in its long harmonious finish.

Name: Monte Oton Garnacha
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Rich red color this wine present characters of blackberry, fresh blueberry and wild berry jam along with delicate hits of cloves and fresh herbs. medium to full bodied with a well balanced acidity the including wine displays a velvety finish.

Name: Lone Oak Ranch Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Sweet raspberry, chocolate, strawberry, caramel, honey, cardamom, rose petal, lavender, hints of tobacco spice, and cotton candy.

Name: Red Blend
Wine Description: This wine is a dark rich blend with full mouth feel, subtle earth notes and lighter-style, fruit with a hint of violets on the nose and loaded with black fruit on the palate,and traditional tannins and vanilla finish.

Name: Saint-Estèphe
Wine Description: It is soft and velvety, with blueberry and blackberry aromas. Full body, with round tannins and a long finish. A rich and almost jammy wine.

Name: Chianti Borghi D'Elsa
Wine Description: N/A

Name: In Violas Merlot
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Red Mountain Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Zinfandel Ballistic
Wine Description: This wine is a lovely ruby red with a big, ripe berry-filled nose with just a touch of black pepper. The fruit-forward palate expresses blackberry, cherry and currant flavors with verve, followed by hints of herb, spice and pepper. Nice acidity makes this a great food wine.

Name: Red Blend (Aged in Bourbon Barrels)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Mountain Cuvée
Wine Description: Mountain Cuvee begins with sweet and vibrant red cherry aromas, alongside notes of rhubarb, lavender, earth and spice. Rich, mouth-filling and backed by well-balanced tannins, it offers a pleasing array of ripe red and black fruit flavors highlighting cherry and plum layers.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Color is rich with an intense gem-like quality paired with dark violet highlights. This is a full-bodied wine that displays solid structure and complexity, exhibiting dark red fruit and a lingering finish.

Name: Educated Guess Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: It’s rich, ripe and focused with juicy black cherry and cassis fruit, currants and hints of mint all tied together with a creamy french vanilla middle and a finish lingering. Educated Guess fills all the requirements that a serious cabernet lover is looking for, while remaining fun, approachable, and food friendly!

Name: EPU
Wine Description: EPU Chilean Almaviva is a dark wine, concentrated aroma of black fruit, menthol, chocolate and traces of vanilla and black pepper. The taste is velvety, full-bodied, dense, very fruity and persistent aftertaste with woody and glycerin.

Name: Brunello di Montalcino
Wine Description: It a brilliant ruby red colour, tending towards garnet red with age. Its bouquet is intense, pure, pleasant and refined, reminiscent of sweet violet, tobacco, chocolate and pleasant hints of wild berries and vanilla. Its flavour fully confirms the above in a well-balanced, full-bodied wine with good tannins and a solid structure.

Name: Bouquet de Monbrison Margaux
Wine Description: Dark red purple color with cherry, berry, earth, and herbs on the nose. The entry to the palate is sweet and leads to red fruit flavors such as cherry along with a nice earthy tone to the finish.

Name: Pícaro Viñas Viejas
Wine Description: Dynamic and fresh wine that reflects the personality of the terroir. The nose highlights its pleasant aroma of red and black fruit with sweet and floral touches. Medium bodied, silky texture, is characterized by its fresh style with marked fruity notes, juicy tannins and a long, lingering finish.

Name: Beaujolais Nouveau
Wine Description: The first wine of the harvest from Beaujolais, France. Shiny blueberry color. Intensely fruity with flavors of black fruits such as black currant and ripe black cherries. Generous, soft and silky, it gives an impression of sweetness that coats the palate. The finish is subtle and fresh. Simply superb !

Name: Vinha da Tapada Coelheiros
Wine Description: It is intense ruby colour. Aroma is ripe red fruit and jam.Flavor is well balanced and complex, with round tannins, fruity and persistent.Dishes with which to be served is white meats, roasted or grilled, fish dishes and spicy risotto and cheese.

Name: Old Vine Zinfandel
Wine Description: Berries and spice on the nose, dark, sweet fruit fills the palate with just a hint of black pepper. This wine has a long, lingering finish.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Overwhelming cherry and vivid plums create a welcome first impression, while touches of green tea leaves and leather nestle themselves among the spicy, saucy fruit. Touches of melted caramel and white pepper. With well-integrated tannins and a rich and round finish.

Name: Musar Jeune Rouge
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Color, almost a deep black purple. On the nose it is loaded with black currant and cassis. The palate is rich, full bodied and has a touch more tannin.

Name: Silk Soft Red Blend
Wine Description: Smooth red blend that caresses you with every sip. Bright, red ruby hue in the glass and alluring fragrance of dried violets and berries, Silk beckons. Succulent cherry and ripe raspberry flavors mingle with delicate hints of rose petals and toasty spice, and glide gracefully across your palate like liquid silk.

Name: I Imaginador Cinsault
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Crianza
Wine Description: Opaque cherry red color. Floral (Damascus rose) and fruit (strawberry, raspberry) aromas with spicy and smoky notes imparted by oak aging. Velvety, smooth, with fine, juicy tannins.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: It has showcases notes of Rainier cherry and juicy raspberry, which are enhanced by structural nuances of mushroom, earth and tobacco.

Name: Unshackled Red Blend
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Riserva Cannonau di Sardegna
Wine Description: It has ruby red gradually shades into warmer, less intense shades as the wine ages. the faintly tousled woodland fragrances of the wine’s first year mature with ageing into a complex, elegant bouquet proffering distinct whiffs of violets that fuse well with the tertiary notes of spiciness contributed by cask conditioning.

Name: Southern Hills Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: It has flavors of black cherry, dark plum and a hint of coffee. Rich, yet approachable tannins provide a long, smooth finish.

Name: Brolio Chianti Classico
Wine Description: Brolio successfully matches the superior drinkability that defines Chianti Classico in its young version with a full, complex structure, which makes this wine excellent in its category.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Flavours of blackcurrants, mocha and spice. Created with a simple philosophy in mind - to make a great wine that everyone can enjoy anytime in any place. Enjoy this wine with a bunch of friends and your favourite cheese.

Name: Cabernet
Wine Description: N/A

Name: A Bold Quilt Red
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Haut-Médoc
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Trumpeter Malbec
Wine Description: The Trumpeter Malbec has a deep violet color with vibrant shades of red. The nose is full of ripe currant fruit aromas interwoven with accents of tobacco and vanilla.

Name: 60 Sessantanni Old Vines Primitivo di Manduria
Wine Description: Intense ruby red colour, wide and complex to the nose, fruity, with a prune and cherry jam aroma, with notes of tobacco, slightly spicy. A full-bodied wine, soft and rich in fine tannins, with notes of cocoa, coffee and vanilla in the end.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon (Reserve)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Lifted aromas of ripe cherries and spice lead this wine. The palate is soft and generous with delicate primary fruit characters of wild berries shadowed by subtle toasty oak.

Name: Treo Winemaker's Blend
Wine Description: N/A
